article:
{{Infobox Brand |logo= |name=Wall's |image= |type=Sausages, Meat pies
|currentowner=Kerry Group |origin= England |introduced= 1786 |discontinued=
|related= Wall's (ice cream) |markets= |previousowners= Unilever
|trademarkregistrations= |website= [http://www.wallsproperfood.co.uk/
www.wallsproperfood.co.uk] |tagline= The Finest Cuts }} 'Wall's' is a brand of
meat products in the United Kingdom, best known for its sausages. Founded in
London in 1786 by butcher Richard Wall, http://www.wallsproperfood.co.uk/about-
us.aspx it was acquired in 1922 by Lever Brothers, which became a part of
Unilever in 1930. Unilever sold off the meat products business and a licence to
use the Wall's brand on such within the United Kingdom in 1994 to Kerry Group.
